name: Spectral Jumper
description:
Happy to show the first game I've ever completed, game was made for QaziJam 7 with about 50 hours of active development, coming into it I had no experience and I can really say this was a great, but demanding experience, and hope to be a full time game dev.

Controls -

A or Left Arrow key - Move Left

D or Right Arrow key - Move Right

W or Space or Up Arrow key - Jump

Left click or E - Switch Colo(u)rs

Pressing Z makes the window larger.

Not on all levels will you be able to double jump

Have fun playing, feedback greatly appreciated.

Updated to make level 2 double jump obvious.

Updated to add death counter
